Justification: To check for any signs of infection or other abnormalities in the urine.
To rule out a urinary tract infection.
To check for any signs of infection or other abnormalities in the blood.
To check for any electrolyte imbalances that could be contributing to bedwetting.
To assess kidney function and rule out any underlying kidney problems.
To assess the function of the bladder and urethra and rule out any structural abnormalities.
To help Ethan learn to wake up when he needs to urinate.
